rows.label: qst201308_msg0001
rows.name:
How was it? Did you pick
up any good leads?

rows.label: qst201308_msg0002
rows.name:
No...I'm afraid nobody seemed to
have any notable information.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0004
rows.name:
I asked around a bit myself, but
couldn't find anything new either.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0005
rows.name:
B-but they've got to be out there
somewhere, right? They can't have
just...vanished forever...

rows.label: qst201308_msg0007
rows.name:
I promise I'll find your boy
and all the other children. Just
give me a little more time.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0008
rows.name:
I hope you're right... I
really don't know who else
to turn to right now!

rows.label: qst201308_msg0009
rows.name:
Many people enter and exit Avaritia every
day. Is it possible that they could have
been taken to a different nation?

rows.label: qst201308_msg0010
rows.name:
It sounds like Goldmund has been
searched quite thoroughly. Other
nations may be the only possibility.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0011
rows.name:
But it would take a long time for
us all to travel from country to
country searching for leads.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0012
rows.name:
Perhaps we should make use of our
mercenary manpower to efficiently
investigate on all fronts?

rows.label: qst201308_msg0016
rows.name: An excellent idea. Can you handle it?

rows.label: qst201308_msg0013
rows.name:
But of course. I'll let you know as
soon as we have any information.

rows.label: qst201308_msg0014
rows.name:
Thank you, Tokiha. You're a
very upstanding individual.
